item.title: Basic Web App with Rust
item.description: This post describes the Rust stack for a basic web app that consists of a REST API, a Postgres database and a few views with JavaScript and CSS.

item.description: Converting spelled-out German cardinal numbers to numerals and vice versa. Exercise in writing finite-state transducers.
